Text:
Thanks DarthEG, but this is not the OBC, it is the Original London Cast.  I've been looking for the Original Broadway Cast.  Can anyone help?

Thanks

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4775312/MISS_SAIGON_ORIGINAL_BROADWAY_CAST

Just uploaded that a few minutes ago... dunno if that's what you're looking for.

Oops. My apologies for that. I have quite a bit of musicals and I guess I lost track as to what I was doing.

Thanks for pointing it out. I've corrected it to reflect the London cast.
